```{r setup, include=FALSE}
chunk_option_ggtibble <- function(options) {
  if (isTRUE(options$ggtibble)) {
    browser()
    stop()
  }
}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_hooks$set(ggtibble = chunk_option_ggtibble)
```
